alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake County through 315 PM MDT... At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kerr, or near Polson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Polson, Pablo, Rocky Point, Jette, Kerr, Turtle Lake and Finley Point. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 51 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
